dialog.humvil.about.desc:
Transforms villagers found in villages into humans (NPCs)!
This uses the new Mannequin entity.
dialog.humvil.config.desc: This datapack has the following available settings, this are the default options:
dialog.humvil.config.pool.name: New humans will be selected from
dialog.humvil.config.pool.options.1: Players that have joined this world and random ones.
dialog.humvil.config.pool.options.2: Only players that have joined this world.
dialog.humvil.config.mainhand.name: The main hand for the humans will be
dialog.humvil.config.mainhand.right-hand: If "Random" selected, percentage for the Human to be right-handed (rest for left-handed)
dialog.humvil.config.equipment.name: Humans inherit equipment from its original entity.
dialog.humvil.config.npc.allow_custom_ta: Override the "NPC" tag below the mannequin's name.
dialog.humvil.config.animations.name: Allow for animations in Humans (Swimming while on water, double-crouching while near players...).
dialog.humvil.config.conversations.allow: Allow for conversations between Humans and Players.
dialog.humvil.config.conversations.frequ: Chance per tick for a Human to start a conversation (1 = 0.01%%)
Specify which entities can be humanized
Only naturally spawning villagers & zombified villagers, once they have been cured, from structures (villages, igloo...).
Only transform the specified entities (via manual tags and functions).
